member.name: M:PhotogGalleryApp.Controllers.TagController.GetTags
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all tags.

member.name: M:PhotogGalleryApp.Controllers.TagController.GetTag(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific tag by ID.
member.param: The ID of the tag to retrieve.

member.name: M:PhotogGalleryApp.Controllers.TagController.PutTag(System.Int32,Tag)
member.summary: Updates a specific tag by ID.
member.param: The ID of the tag to update.

member.name: M:PhotogGalleryApp.Controllers.TagController.DeleteTag(System.Int32)
